subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali has defended his title in the Tirreno-Adriatico race in Italy, finishing 23 seconds ahead of Chris Froome, the Tour de France runner-up.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali has defended his title in the Tirreno-Adriatico race in Italy, finishing 23 seconds ahead of Chris Froome, the Tour de France runner-up.
